overview:
Vision: To provide services that nurture the ties between people, businesses and townships, through eGifts. 

Mission: To create a connected society built on better relationships by circulating love. 

Statement and Tagline: It has become rather easy these days, to connect with anyone. But we believe we all seek not just a mere connection but one that connects through the heart. In this realistic society, relationships tend to be dry with too much emphasis on rationality and efficiency. In fact, the traits of human ties of sending, receiving and sharing love and care, is probably diminishing. Giftee, in providing eGift as its foremost service, hopes to build all kinds of ties between the people, businesses and their townships. By having more warm connections in our world, it could make spontaneous feelings more forthcoming. As this starts to circulate smoothly, we should be forming a society built on better relationships. And so with this belief, we forge ahead.

SLICE is a platform for enabling interoperability and removing friction in online payments. We help payments and credit providers in South East Asia achieve ubiquity of merchant acceptance. Our mission is to create an open commerce network that offers consumers maximum choice and convenience. SLICE is a start-up company headquartered in Singapore. SLICE is led by veterans from the fintech industry and backed by some of the leading venture capitalists.

overview:
Chúng tôi xây dựng quy trình quản lý hệ thống tập trung, chuyên nghiệp. VIVU luôn lấy khách hàng làm trung tâm, đảm bảo mang lại những lợi ích tốt nhất cho xã hội.
Mô hình hoạt động chung: Tận dụng tối ưu chuyến xe trống của các tài xế ở các lộ trình khác nhau, điển hình là chiều đi/chiều về sân bay Nội Bài, qua đó cung cấp cho khách hàng chuyến đi với giá giảm từ 40-70% so với giá thị trường.

Tầm nhìn: Vivu không chỉ dừng lại ở việc tạo nên một hệ thống giải pháp vận tải công nghệ 4.0, mà còn khao khát góp phần vào việc chuyển mình của nền kinh tế Việt Nam, một nền kinh tế hiện đại, bền vững, thân thiện với môi trường. Sứ mệnh: Đem đến cho nền vận tải một dịch vụ bền vững nhất, cho xã hội một tiện ích bền vững – an toàn nhất, cho khách hàng những chuyến xe tốt nhất, đem đến cho đối tác những lợi ích triển vọng nhất là Sứ mệnh của chúng tôi.
Giá trị cốt lõi
Công nghệ: Chúng tôi áp dụng công nghệ để tạo nên một cộng đồng vận tải gọn nhẹ, thông thái, giảm áp lực cho hạ tầng giao thông. Chia sẻ: Chúng tôi tạo nên một hệ sinh thái chung và chia sẻ nó cho tất cả hành khách, tài xế, đối tác để cùng đi đến thành công.

Bền vững: Chúng tôi luôn tự hào rằng bảo vệ môi trường chính là bền vững, tối ưu hóa trải nghiệm của khác hàng cũng là bền vững. Đổi mới: Chúng tôi không ngừng đổi mới công nghệ và dịch vụ của mình, đáp ứng được sự vận động không ngừng nghỉ của xã hội.
POD

overview:
KUZEN, the no-code AI chatbot platform.

Concierge U, Inc. started developing KUZEN in 2016 and it has now grown into a platform that is used by numerous enterprise companies across industries such as finance and manufacturing. We are aiming for an IPO in a few years with the spirit of independently thinking and proactively opening up in areas where no market has existed before. We are looking forward to having you join our team and play an active role as a core member of our business growth.

KUZEN already has about 300 enterprise customers, and we are developing it to dominate the market of no-code chatbots that meet complex requirements from customers. We are looking forward to working with you to accelerate our business development in this flat and open-minded organization.

overview:
Torus.AI (Torus Actions) was founded in 2019 by a group of scientists led by Nguyen Tien Zung (Distinguished Professor of Mathematics, University of Toulouse) as a company specialized in the development of intelligence solutions for life, especially in the domains of healthcare and well-being, but also in signal processing, objects detection, etc. We work like an incubator & an R&D center, building a dedicated team for every promising project, that may eventually become an independent company in our Torus ecosystem
At present, we have four companies that share the name Torus:
- Torus Actions, which functions mainly as an incubator & R&D center
- BelleTorus (brand name: Belle.AI) which is a US-based global healthcare AI company, the most trusted company in AI for dermatology, founded in 2021 by Torus Actions & US-based tech entrepreneurs
- Torus Medical, founded in 2020 under the name Torus9 & dedicated to the development of AI solutions for spine surgery & other medical problems, in cooperation with US-based tech entrepreneurs
- Torus Vietnam, founded in 2021 by very experienced high-level IT managers and specialized in outsourcing for the development of AI solutions of other companies

Website : https://www.torus.ai/

Pomelo Pay focuses on mobile payment technologies and we turn merchants’ smartphones into a point-of-sale machine using our proprietary app. No more big, expensive POS machines but an app that merchants can download and start accepting payments. With over 50% of businesses not accepting some form of mobile payments, Pomelo Pay is aiming to bring all businesses into the cashless society using the latest and most innovating mobile technologies. 

We don’t know where we will end up, but so far, our journey has been fantastic. The founders are an ambitious bunch, so we are really looking for an ambitious individual to join Pomelo Pay. What matters to us is that we want you to grow as the Company grows and make this role a career defining role for yourself. If you want to see how you can have a huge impact on a fast-growth company, then this is for you.
